| History                 = The Golden Tigers were an important and feared [[Triads (Earth-616)|gang]] operating out of the [[Canal Street]] area of [[Chinatown (New York)|Chinatown]], and led by [[Robert Hao (Earth-616)|Chaka Khan]], whose members were skilled in martial arts and the use of melee weapons. They were involved in a variety of criminal activities including protection rackets.{{r|Iron Fist Vol 1 8}}

Upon the arrest of the boss of the [[Maggia (Earth-616)|Maggia]], [[Ruffio Costa (Earth-616)|Ruffio Costa]], they attempted to take advantage of the power vacuum to become the dominant crime power in [[New York City]].{{r|Iron Fist Vol 1 8}} [[Daniel Rand (Earth-616)|Iron Fist]], was able to put a stop to those plans, defeating Chaka Khan which was followed by the arrest of many of the Golden Tigers.{{r|Iron Fist Vol 1 10}}

The Golden Tigers were later rebuilt by [[Thomas Arn (Earth-616)|Chaka]], who used them in a crime wave of extortion and raids in Chinatown and the neighboring communities. After being defeated by the Iron Fist, the community provided the [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|NYPD]] with testimony regarding the activities of the Golden Tigers.{{r|Power Man and Iron Fist Vol 1 72}}
